content: We are launching a profile for (Mobile) Medication Administration.
I hope we can use this channel to discuss it in the Public Comment phase. I will try to make a summary to facilitate review by non-IHE colleagues.

The profile covers 2 things :
1. Get medication administration requests (i.e. the detailed plan of scheduled administration events), such as filling in the nurse's task list for a shift. Or populating my smartphone's medication reminder app...
2. Report the administration results - informing whether we took it or not, etc.
it supports from point-in-time medication (oral solids) to complex administration (perfusions with changing rates or changing mix of products)
YES, that is a fine use of this stream!!!

I made a summary of where MMA helps.
http://zeora.net/blog/2017/11/01/ihe-mma-standard-interoperability-for-mobile-medication-administration/
Jose, add that blog link to your MMA wiki page http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Mobile_Medication_Administration
